coHero.title: Join the Brazilian Hands Cooperative
coHero.subtitle: At Brazilian Hands Cooperative, we are always looking for new Brazilian employees willing to offer cleaning, maintenance, beauty, and others.If you are in Ireland and look for a flexible and well paid job opportunity, be part of our team!

coAbout.badge: In doubt if it is for you?
coAbout.title: Who can be part?
coAbout.subtitle1: If you have a talent for services such as residential cleaning, gardening, painting, repairs or beauty, and are in Ireland looking for an opportunity, we want you on our team!Whether experienced or new in the area, in
coAbout.subtitle2: We offer support for you to feel safe and valued at work.

coChoose.title: Reasons to work at BHC
coChoose.cardSubtitle1: Here, you get 80% of the value of each service provided.It is one of the best returns on the market, ensuring that your effort is just rewarded.
coChoose.cardSubtitle2: You decide where and when you want to work.You can choose to serve only in your city or move to others, according to your availability and means of transport.At Brazilian Hands Cooperative, who controls your schedule is you!
coChoose.cardSubtitle3: We take care of all the administrative part!The company receives the payment of customers and makes the transfer directly to you.This means that you can focus on what you do best, without worry about bureaucracies.
